txt.en: A wealth of lore awaits those who brave the Bones of Barad-dûr.
You have successfully braved the Bones of Barad-dûr and defeated many Black Númenóreans there.

An urgent notice is pinned to the board:

'Black Númenóreans have been spotted in Barad-dûr. A brave adventurer is needed to defeat foes within the ruins. Seek out Candúr in Udûn to learn more.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Barad-dûr: Realm of the Black Word to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Candúr can be found in Udûn.\n\nYou should talk to Candúr.
